title: Patch Notes
content:
the other paladin auras. Clarified that Crusader's Mantle affects the caster as well as any nearby allies.

Improved camera shots, mocap animations, character staging, and facial expressions in many dialogues across the game. Fixed pops, jitters, and clipping in many dialogues across the game. Improved camera angles for characters of different heights in cinematics across the game. Fixed some alignment issues when smooching Lae'zel as a male githyanki. Fixed several visual bugs, like odd camera
